snippet: Learning about how one scientist is using bioluminescence to draw attention to water pollution, holding a class forum on the issue and then finding ways to take action.
abstract: Learning about how one scientist is using bioluminescence to draw attention to water pollution, holding a class forum on the issue and then finding ways to take action.

byline.original: By JENNIFER CUTRARO and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

headline.main: Making the Invisible Visible: Exploring and Addressing Water Pollution
